title: Super-easy beef lasagne
ingredients: ['450g lean minced beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms, drained', '800g tomato based pasta sauce', '450g cottage cheese', '550g ricotta cheese', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs', '450g lasagne sheets', '225g grated mozzarella cheese, divided']
